Scourge smiled sliding his mask on. "If you wish to join our ranks i'll be 
preparing a base in this area soon, till then we will be staying at our crash 
sight, your voice will br recorded into our files so you may enter at any time." 
He turned picking up his cannon and sheathed it walking towards the exist...
